Package com.facebook.stats

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssociativeAggregation
    Aggregation operation that maintains the associative property on multiple combinations.
    CompositeEventCounterIf<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>  
    EventCounter
    marker interface: this is required for for any class that requires a generic of the type C extends EventCounterIf
    EventCounterIf<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>
    counter object representing some value over a timespan [start, end) mutable via the add() metthod
    EventRate  
    FacebookStatsReporter
    A interface for reporting statistics (counters, exported values)
    GaugeCounter
    Like an EventCounter but with additional functionality and additional overhead.
    GaugeCounterFactory
    Factory interface for creating new GaugeCounters
    HistoryManager  
    ReadableMultiWindowCounter  
    ReadableMultiWindowGauge  
    ReadableMultiWindowRate  
    WritableMultiWindowStat  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCompositeCounter<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>
    Tracks stats over a rolling time period (time window) of maxLength broken into parts (eventCounters list) of size maxChunkLength.
    AbstractCompositeSum<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>  
    AssociativeAggregationCounter  
    CompositeGaugeCounter
    Keeps a list of gauge counters (see AbstractCompositeCounter) that look like one summarized gauge counter.
    CompositeMax  
    CompositeMin  
    CompositeSum
    stats class that is useful for tracking the number of events that occur in a given time window.
    CounterCacher  
    DecayCounter
    special purpose counter that decays exponentially fashion.
    DefaultGaugeCounter
    Default implementation of GaugeCounter.
    DefaultGaugeCounterFactory  
    EventCounterImpl
    reference implementation of a simple counter for a bounded period of time
    EventRateImpl  
    ExponentialDecay  
    FastGaugeCounter
    Fast implementation of GaugeCounter that may give slightly inaccurate values in certain race conditions, but should produce close to accurate results in the long run.
    FastGaugeCounterFactory  
    MaxEventCounter  
    MinEventCounter  
    MultiWindowDistribution  
    MultiWindowGauge  
    MultiWindowMax  
    MultiWindowMin  
    MultiWindowRate  
    MultiWindowSpread
    Stats container that tracks the following multi-window metrics: 1) min 2) gauge - average, rate, sample count 3) max
    QuantileDigest
    QuantileDigest.Bucket  
    ShardedConcurrentCounter  
    StatsManager
    Each stat's name corresponds to a single underlying counter, but each counter can be exported for different uses (ExportTypes).
    SumEventCounter Deprecated
    see original simple implementation, EventCounterImpl which does the same thing, but avoids encapsulation violation
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HistoryManager.ExportType  
    MultiWindowDistribution.Quantile
